content: चिंत् {c10c} <ab>U.</ab> (चिंतयति-ते, चिंतित) {@--1@} To think, consider, reflect, ponder over; तच्छ्रुत्वा पिंगलकश्चिंतयामास <ls>Pt. 1</ls> चिंतय तावत्केनापदेशेन पुनराश्रमपदं गच्छामः <ls>Ś. 2.</ls> {@--2@} To think of, have an idea of, bring before the mind; तस्मादेतत् (वित्तं) न चिंतयेत् <ls>H. 1</ls>; तस्मादस्य; वधं राजा मनसापि न चिंतयेत् <ls>Ms. 8. 381</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">4. 258</ls>; <ls>Pt. 1. 135</ls>; <ls>Ch. P. 1.</ls> {@--3@} To mind, take care of, look to; तातस्त्वां चिंतयिष्यति <ls>Ś. 4.</ls>; <ab>cf.</ab> also <ls>R. 1. 64</ls>; <ls>U. 1. 19.</ls> {@--4@} To call to mind, remember. {@--5@} To find out, devise, discover, think out; कोप्युपायश्चिंत्यतां <ls>H. 1.</ls> {@--6@} To regard as, esteem. {@--7@} To weigh, discriminate. {@--8@} To discuss, treat of, consider.
